title: Streeterville 2 BR 2 BA w/ parking in full-amenity Grand Ohio bldg
posting_body: Have the best of downtown living with this Streeterville 2 BR/2 BA condo in outstanding building and location.
Unit features master suite with huge walk-in closet and city views, open kitchen with island, hardwood floors.

RENT INCLUDES resort lifestyle amenities, including an on-site health club with cardio and strength-training equipment, free weights, indoor pool, jacuzzi, sauna, and sundeck, as well as tennis/basketball/racquetball courts, laundry room, on-site dry-cleaners, and 24/7 door staff.
Just a short walk to the Lakefront, Mag Mile, Whole foods, Eataly, Riverwalk, Navy Pier, Northwestern Hospital and Downtown Campus!
Blocks from "el" and Lake Shore Drive.
Flexible start: Available September 1, 15 or October 1.
